name: DementiaCareInspirations
0:
”Alexa, open dementia care inspirations”
”Alexa, start dementia care inspirations”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: dementia care inspirations
des: Begin your day by drawing strength from these quotes. They provide inspiration to care partners of people diagnosed with dementia. Sometimes the process of caregiving can be overwhelming. To be resilient you can empower yourself with these quotes who are leaders and participants in the process of caregiving. You truly are not alone. For more inspiration, tools, and tips listen to The Resilient Caregiver Podcast created by a Dementia Care Specialist at the Aging and Disability Resource Center of Southwest Wisconsin. The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment, or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
